summary: During World War I, a British private, sent ahead to a French town to scout for enemy presence, is mistaken for a King by the colorful patients of an insane asylum.
cast: Marc Dudicourt|Daniel Boulanger|Paul Faivre|Jacques Mauclair|Pier Paolo Capponi|Jacques Balutin|Adolfo Celi|Alan Bates|Pierre Brasseur|Michel Serrault|Jean-Claude Brialy|Julien Guiomar|Micheline Presle|Françoise Christophe|Geneviève Bujold|Madeleine Clervanne|Palau|Georges Adet|Jackie Blanchot|Robert Blome|Jean-Marie Bon|Philippe de Broca|Philippe Bruneau|Georges Guéret|Louis Jojot|Daniel Prévost|Yves Robert|Sabine Sun|Sylvain|Eric Vasberg
title: Rey de corazones
